TextBlock.Text: Balagas: yep... this sure is one big ball O' gas. just don't move too fast or else it'll be a pain finding your way back to the center.
this moon might be one that contributes most to the tidal forces that heat up MagMag. as for what gas this is; i don't know. doesn't take a chemist to know it isn't breathable
speaking of gas, how'd this moon accumulate so much of it? its core is so tiny!
